translationFile.description: The file path to the root translation file.
translationFile.x-prompt: Path to the root translation file?

targetTranslationPath.description: The directory path of the target translation files.
targetTranslationPath.x-prompt: Path to the target translation files? (Defaults to the directory of the translation file)

includeContextInTarget.description: Whether to include the context information (like notes) in the target files.
includeContextInTarget.x-prompt: Should the context information (like notes) be included in the target files? This is useful for sending the target translation files to translation agencies/services.

encoding.description: The encoding of the translation files.
encoding.x-prompt: What is the encoding of the translation files?

packageScript.description: Whether to add a script entry in package.json to start the translation server.
packageScript.x-prompt: Add a command to package.json scripts to start the translation server? (The translation server can be started via 'ng run {projectName}:t9n')
